籤詩版本二:
Ukuhlangana kwe-yin ne-yang kuhlala kunqunywa izulu, lapho owesifazane eshada nendoda, kuba umshado ojabulisayo.
Kepha ebona udrako nenyoka behlangana, u-Xionng Zhen ungena ku-orchestra yamaphupho futhi uhlanganiswe kabusha.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele inhlanganisela ye-Yin ne-Yang ne-Dao.
Konke kuhamba kahle.
解曰: Landela inhliziyo yakho. Umshado nokukhulelwa. Umcebo onenzuzo. Okuzuzisa kakhulu ku-silkworm yasendle.
籤詩故事一:
◇ U-Li Dan nodrako kanye ne-phoenix bayasebenzisana
U-Li Dan waba u-Ruizong Wobukhosi BamaTang, u-Wu Zetian wathatha isihlalo sobukhosi, futhi umbusi wehliswa waba umuntu ovamile futhi wahlala emaphandleni. Wahlangana no-Hu Fengjiao futhi washada. Ngokwezinganekwane, bobabili babenengxenye yesikwele sophawu olukhishwe ebhandeni lengane, ngemva kokudlulisa "uphawu lokulwa", bafakazela ukuthi bangaba munye futhi baba indoda nomfazi.
(Udrako ubhekisela kuRuizong, kanti iphoenix ibhekisela kuHu Fengjiao. Kusho ukuthi umshado unqunywa izulu.)
聖意: Ukuvikeleka kwasekhaya, ukuzicabangela, ingcebo, ibhizinisi, umshado, Liujia, amadoda ahamba ngezinyawo emasimini, izikelemu zesilika ziyachuma, izilwane ziyaphumelela, zifuna abantu, amacala afanelekile, ukufuduka kuyaphumelela, impahla elahlekile iyatholakala, izifo zihlangene, okuhle amakhambi ayatholakala, izintaba namathuna kuyinhlanhla
古人: U-Li Dan dragon kanye nokubambisana kwe-phoenix
